extension.name: Content - JExtBOX Equation
extension.author: Galaa
extension.description:
This simple free plugin helps to you displaying math equations (LaTeX) and figures (PSPicture).

Visit www.JExtBOX.com for more advanced version:

  1. All front-end components and modules support
  2. AJAX support
  3. Editor button/Popup Modal Window for insert math
  4. Live Preview
  5. Skip Pre & Code tags
  6. Clean-up spaces after line equations
  7. MathJax version selection, local installation support, fallback, custom config
